on him grew this month when the newspaper suspended his former news editor over hacking claims. Tony Blair 's former spin doctor Alastair Campbell said there was a`` greater stench'' to the scandal. He said: First, there's the issue of David Cameron and George Osborne 's judgment, then there's the News of the World and what appears to be industrial phone hacking going on systematically.`` There's also the issue of the News Corp takeover of BSkyB and the apparent attempts by Jeremy Hunt, the Culture Secretary, to let that go through without proper scrutiny, and finally there's the extraordinary conduct of the police.
